title: Self-Regulated Learning Strategy Workshop for Practitioners: VR-Based Reflective Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental organizational work experience and proficiency in learning management tools
context.additional_context: Practical application of self-regulated learning strategies via VR-based scenario training and simulation of complex work environments faced by current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply the self-regulated learning model (plan-execute-evaluate-reflect) phases to real work situations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners achieve a score of 3 or higher on a 4-point scale in decision-making abilities using metacognitive strategies when selecting learning strategies in a VR simulation environment.
Learners consistently demonstrate the competency to analyze weekly learning outcomes and establish improvement plans through reflective journaling in three consecutive evaluations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
